tool_description: An API which lists all the CP problems
title: CP Problems API

api_list.name: All Problems
api_list.description: Get all the problems from CP platform
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cp-problems-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cp-problems-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
